arts.sum: Inter are preparing to reinforce and rejuvenate their defence, potentially as early as January, with Nathan Ake, Marc Guehi and Dayot Upamecano amongst the names linked to the Nerazzurri. arts.ttl: Liverpool will pose a real test for Manchester City on Sunday.
arts.sum: As good as City’s wins over Bournemouth and Dortmund have been, this Sunday’s match at the Etihad against the current Premier League champions will be a real test for a resurgent Manchester City side. So after their recent blip, there are signs that the Premier League champions are beginning to come back to life.
